title: Revisiting The Night Abraham Lincoln Was Shot 150 Years Ago
teaser: On this day in 1865, John Wilkes Booth shot President Lincoln. Renee Montagne talks to author James Swanson at Ford's Theatre. (This piece initially aired on Feb. 12, 2009 on Morning Edition).
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
